dc_description_s: Emergency response area (ERA) is the Minnesota Department of Health (MDH) approved surface and subsurface area surrounding a public water supply well that completely contains the scientifically calculated 1 year time-of-travel and is managed by the entity identified in a wellhead protection plan.
dc_creator_sm: Minnesota Department of Health - Environmental Health Division - Source Water Protection Unit
dc_relation_sm: Drinking Water Supply Management Areas, Drinking Water Supply Management Area Vulnerability, Wellhead Protection Areas,
